A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Solidly fun movie. Different movie in its scale. No Star Wars movie has ever taken place so quickly after the previous film nor has one taken place on such a short amount of time. It’s not a perfect Star Wars film\, but it’s a solid Star Wars film. Events in the film make me sadder about Carrie Fisher’s passing. I hope they simply recast the role so that we can see Princess Leia’s story. I will say I’m not a big fan of the comedy infused into the franchise lately\, but that seems to be what is happening in most of sci-fi/fantasy genre.
